about_the_game:
A Wizard's Spell Causes the Night Sky to Fall to the Earth

Play as Atlas, a magical hero born from a star on a journey around the world in search of the fallen pieces of the night sky. Explore the mysteries of a magical planet where secrets and formidable challenges await your discovery. Discover and craft magical powers and equipment to defeat enemies and overcome obstacles. Fly on a broom and perform advanced techniques and acrobatics to soar through environments and reach new heights. Fight powerful celestial beasts transforming and restoring them into protective constellations that illuminate the darkened sky. A malevolent presence lurks at the heart of this planet's mysterious history. Will you rise to the challenge, harness the power of the stars, and thwart the encroaching darkness threatening to engulf the cosmos?

A Twist on the Metroidvania Genre

Collect celestial gems and harness the power of the Star Atlas in your personal observatory to unlock and equip new combat, exploration, and movement abilities. Discover new areas and overcome obstacles with your new powers, return to the observatory and re-customize your abilities and gear before setting off on adventure again.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS 2.0 / Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1-compatible, 512 MB video memory, framebuffer object support. E.g. Intel HD 4600 or better.
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
